attributes.action: Replace the House of Lords with a Senate elected through Proportional Representation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To enable greater democracy I propose that the New Second House at Westminster
be elected through the system of Proportional Representation.
We have a unique opportunity to revitalise politics in the United Kingdom by taking the radical step of allowing a far more diverse range of opinions to be heard at the centre of Government.
All the minor parties that currently exist and those of the future have little or no chance of breaking the current stranglehold of the big three parties represented in the House of Commons- however the ever dwindling number of people who engage in the political process will be far more likely to vote if fresh points of view and politicians have REAL access to the corridors of power.
This is an opportunity for true democracy to be extended to all parts of the British electorate

 MAKE IT HAPPEN
